name: UIContextualAction
desc: An action to display when the user swipes a table row.

items.name: init(style: UIContextualAction.Style, title: String?, handler: UIContextualAction.Handler)
items.desc: Creates a new contextual action with the specified title and handler.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title displayed on the action button.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor!
items.desc: The background color of the action button.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display in the action button.

items.name: var handler: UIContextualAction.Handler
items.desc: The handler block to execute when the user selects the action.

items.name: typealias UIContextualAction.Handler
items.desc: The handler block to call in response to the selection of an action

items.name: var style: UIContextualAction.Style
items.desc: The style that is applied to the action button.

items.name: enum UIContextualAction.Style
items.desc: Constants indicating the style information that is applied to the action button.
